package.name: DS_PrivateSales
package.summary: Adds the possibility to hide & lock certain parts of your stores for guests.
package.description:
Adds the possibility to hide & lock certain parts of your stores for guests, guiding them to authenticate themselves first.

Features

  • Registration can be disabled
  • Registration panel at login page can be hidden or customized
  • Forgot Password can be disabled
  • Full Store can be blocked, and if not
    Catalog&Product Views and Search can be blocked separately
    CMS page views can be blocked separately
  • Catalog navigation can be hided
  • Configurable custom error messages when trying to access locked registration / forgot password
  • Fixes redirect to startpage not working when customer_startup_redirect_dashboard option is disabled
  • Admin ACL for configuration

All restrictions move away once the user is logged in.

Included translations: de_DE

Note: To avoid 404 errors in admin please re-login after first installation.

For more information please visit our official extension page (currently in german only).

Special Thanks to Psynapse (psynapse.com.au) for supporting this extension.
